 2015-09262015-06-18,  ,  DESD,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Employment and Social Development of CAROL LOUGHREY, O.C., of Fredericton, New Brunswick, to be a member of the Board of Directors of the National Capital Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Eric D. MacKenzie, effective July 1, 2015.
